attributes.action: Stop the pointless and expensive "Trials" on Road Pricing, to scrap the idea of Road Pricing full stop.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The govt is proposing consultation and trials for road-pricing. This is simply a "going through the motions" excercise as no sane,sober person beleives they have not made the decision already.
We must campaign hard to stop this lunacy before it even gets born.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
